depositor noun [C]
(MONEY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who keeps money at a bank: Depositors will be informed of any change in interest rates.
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person or company that puts money into a bank account: Four hundred small depositors closed their accounts.
